headline: Netflix Makes Majority Cash Bid for Warner Discovery
summary: Netflix has sweetened its offer for  Warner Bros. Discovery  in a second round of bids as it tries to outdo rival Paramount.  The streamer on Monday made a primarily cash-based second offer for the entertainment and streaming assets of Warner Discovery and is working to secure tens of billions in financing to fund the purchase, people familiar with the matter said.  Paramount also made an improved offer for all of Warner Discovery, including its collection of cable networks like CNN and TNT, some of the people said.

content.title: Netflix Makes Majority Cash Bid for Warner Discovery
content.summary: Netflix has sweetened its offer for  Warner Bros. Discovery  in a second round of bids as it tries to outdo rival Paramount.  The streamer on Monday made a primarily cash-based second offer for the entertainment and streaming assets of Warner Discovery and is working to secure tens of billions in financing to fund the purchase, people familiar with the matter said.  Paramount also made an improved offer for all of Warner Discovery, including its collection of cable networks like CNN and TNT, some of the people said.

headline: Netflix Offers Mostly Cash for Warner Bros. in New Bid Round
summary: Bankers for Paramount Skydance Corp., Comcast Corp. and Netflix worked over the long Thanksgiving weekend on improved offers for all or part of Warner Bros., said the people, who asked not to be identified discussing nonpublic information.  Paramount’s offer, while largely backed by the family of Oracle Corp. co-founder Larry Ellison, includes debt financing from Apollo Global Management Inc. Middle East funds are also contributing, the people said.  Netflix, the streaming industry leader, is working on a bridge loan that totals tens of billions of dollars, one of the people said.

content.title: Netflix Offers Mostly Cash for Warner Bros. in New Bid Round
content.summary: Bankers for Paramount Skydance Corp., Comcast Corp. and Netflix worked over the long Thanksgiving weekend on improved offers for all or part of Warner Bros., said the people, who asked not to be identified discussing nonpublic information.  Paramount’s offer, while largely backed by the family of Oracle Corp. co-founder Larry Ellison, includes debt financing from Apollo Global Management Inc. Middle East funds are also contributing, the people said.  Netflix, the streaming industry leader, is working on a bridge loan that totals tens of billions of dollars, one of the people said.

headline: Warner Bros Discovery gets mostly cash offer from Netflix: source
summary:
STORY: :: Netflix

Warner Bros Discovery  has received a second round of bids, including a mostly cash offer from Netflix.

That was according to a Reuters source on Monday.

The auction reportedly could conclude in the coming days or weeks.

The source further said that bankers for Paramount Skydance, Comcast and Netflix worked over the weekend on improved offers for all or part of Warner Bros.

The bids are binding, giving the board scope to approve a deal quickly if terms are met.

Neither party would comment on the news.

Last week, Warner Bros asked bidders to submit improved offers by December 1 after receiving preliminary buyout bids from Paramount Skydance, Comcast and Netflix.

The board previously rejected Paramount's nearly $24-a-share offer for the company, which valued it at $60 billion.

Warner Bros, which is home to the Harry Potter and DC Comics film franchises, plans to split its studio and cable units next year to separate its streaming business from its lagging cable networks.

headline: Is Comcast a Bargain After a 35.6% Drop and Industry Shifts?
summary: Wondering if Comcast might finally be a bargain after all those ups and downs? You are not alone. Many investors are keeping an eye on its value proposition as the stock market evolves. Despite a recent -0.4% dip over the last week and a -35.6% slide over the past year, Comcast’s price moves are creating questions about whether risk or opportunity is driving the story now. Market watchers have noticed that Comcast’s fluctuations come amid industry-wide shifts and regulatory headlines. This...

headline: Netflix Makes a Fresh Warner Discovery Bid, Report Says. This Could Derail the Deal.
summary: The bidding war for  Warner Bros. Discovery  is heating up—but CBS parent  Paramount Skydance  still looks best-placed to see off video streamer  Netflix  and win the takeover battle.  Netflix on Monday made a primarily cash-based second offer for Warner Discovery’s entertainment and studios businesses, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.  Netflix is working to secure tens of billions in financing to fund the deal, per the report.

content.title: Netflix Makes a Fresh Warner Discovery Bid, Report Says. This Could Derail the Deal.
content.summary: The bidding war for  Warner Bros. Discovery  is heating up—but CBS parent  Paramount Skydance  still looks best-placed to see off video streamer  Netflix  and win the takeover battle.  Netflix on Monday made a primarily cash-based second offer for Warner Discovery’s entertainment and studios businesses, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.  Netflix is working to secure tens of billions in financing to fund the deal, per the report.

headline: How Recent Developments Are Shifting the Story Behind Comcast’s Valuation
summary: Comcast’s consensus analyst price target has slipped modestly from $35.10 to $34.65. This reflects a blend of renewed optimism and emerging caution on Wall Street. This subtle change comes as experts weigh Comcast’s steady broadband performance against persistent competitive and operational pressures in the industry. Stay tuned to discover how investors can track the evolving narrative and remain informed as expectations continue to shift. Analyst Price Targets don't always capture the full...

headline: Comcast’s Bid Seeks to Merge NBCUniversal With Warner Bros.
summary: Comcast on Monday made a renewed offer for part of Warner Bros. that would give it control of the combined entity, according to the people, who asked not to be identified because the terms haven’t been made public.  Warner Bros. shareholders would receive a combination of cash and stock in the new entity.  Comcast, a Philadelphia-based cable-TV and internet-service provider, is among three Warner Bros. suitors that submitted offers this week in a second round of bidding.

content.title: Comcast’s Bid Seeks to Merge NBCUniversal With Warner Bros.
content.summary: Comcast on Monday made a renewed offer for part of Warner Bros. that would give it control of the combined entity, according to the people, who asked not to be identified because the terms haven’t been made public.  Warner Bros. shareholders would receive a combination of cash and stock in the new entity.  Comcast, a Philadelphia-based cable-TV and internet-service provider, is among three Warner Bros. suitors that submitted offers this week in a second round of bidding.

headline: AT&T commits to ending DEI programs
summary: U.S. wireless carrier AT&T said in a letter to the U.S. telecoms regulator that it ​had committed to ending diversity, equity and inclusion programs, a move ‌that comes as it seeks approval from the Trump administration to buy wireless spectrum assets.  In ‌November 2024, AT&T agreed to buy some wireless spectrum licenses from U.S. Cellular in a $1.02 billion deal that requires approval from the Federal Communications Commission.
